title: Banning System
body: So I was in a normal game on howling abyss, right? My screen goes black and I realize my computer is out of charge. I was at my friends house so I go back home to get a charger and reconnect back into the game. Fortunately, my team one the 3v3. I was playing Ryze. But I was majorly disappointed because I had received a LeaveBuster for 20min. This is dumb. I shouldn't be banned for something like this. I hope you can make changes in the future to your banning system.

replies.body: I know that your leaving wasn't intentional, but [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties only apply after more than one leave and because leaving still causes negative experiences for others.  Hopefully, the black screen was simply a result of a charging issue and not something else.  If it still persists let me know, and I'd be happy to help!
